Summer was just about to start fortunately, so Nicole used her vacation time for the rest of the school year so she could focus on getting her finances in order. She invested a large amount of money into special accounts and had people manage her money. Basically securing herself a rich life for the rest of her life.

The next thing Nicole did was move out of her small apartment and into something more comfortable. Nicole was never one to splurge, but with this money she could finally buy her dream home. She moved into a beautiful mansion, not too far from where from where she teaches. Nicole didn't want to quit teaching, as it was something she enjoyed doing, so she kept her job at least until she had a reason to quit.

Nicoles new house was something to gawk at. It was very large, and had it's own gym, pool and hot tub, a big backyard and patio for her to relax on, with huge bathrooms, multiple bedrooms, an amazing living and dining room, as well as a stellar kitchen. There were other rooms in the house such as an office, a little movie theatre room, and even a games room. Mind you, Nicole was never one to feel the need for all of these things, but after such a small apartment, she really wanted to live in a house that she could enjoy and go a little crazy in. She had enough money, it wasn't real concern.

She also bought a new car, hired a full time maid, and went shopping for brand new clothes - because she could.

Not gonna lie, thought Nicole, this has been a lot of fun going a little crazy for a change. But I still need to focus on the important stuff after all. Nicole was excited to relax for the summer with all her new money and stuff...
13211.title: A Month Can Really Change Your Life

choices: End of the summer, things haven't changed too much...
End of the summer, Things catch up with them...
They meet up with another lottery winner
132112.content:
Like so many who fall into money, Nicole lost a bit of her way once she won. It wasn't anything too ludicrous, but she definitely got a little caught up in the fun. Nicole had never had money to spend, so for once she was just letting loose. She began to go out to bars and night clubs, and soon found other girls with money to spend. Nicole began to drink almost every night, and began to even experiment with some drugs. She was finally enjoying her college years, even if she was a little late. She got a little lazy and ordered out food often, her house started getting littered with empty bottles and drug paraphernalia, and she hated to admit she kind of loved it.

About a month into this binging lifestyle however, she realized she couldn't keep going so crazy. Her head hurt, and while she was rich, she knew it wasn't a healthy lifestyle to keep. So Nicole found herself easing up and cleaning up. She ended up enjoying the other great part about her wealth, which was her relaxing accessories. Nicole enjoyed ordering food and sitting by the pool all day, while having a drink and maybe smoking some weed too. She often found herself hanging out with co-worker Jess Haskell, who loved spending her days with Nicole considering she had nothing else to do. Both were rich and single, and just wanted to enjoy life for now. Jessica had quit her job at the school the next day, and invested a bunch of her money like Nicole, but has to admit that she likes Nicoles pool and patio more than her own. Jess too had fallen for the indulgent lifestyle of drinking and ordering out. At this time of the summer, Nicole had found she had put on about 10 lbs, simply from poor eating, lack of exercise and drinking. While Nicole was aware of it, she wasn't overly worried. She planned on picking up her older habits once the summer was over, she just wanted to really enjoy her vacation, and you're supposed to put on weight on vacation, right?

Jess had also put on some weight, she had actually put on a little bit more than Nicole, probably because of her recent enjoyment of her own personal chef. Jess only really had a tiny potbelly, and Nicole just put her weight in other places, so neither women really showed it in any negative way.

Currently, both women were sitting by the pool eating some very nice steaks while drinking some craft beer.

"You know something Nic," Jess said while taking a decent gulp of beer, " I have to admit I really fucking love this. I loved teaching, but man oh man I think this is what I want to do for the rest of my life."

Nicole giggled and agreed, unable to speak due to having food in her mouth. "I can't say I disagree with you, though I must say I really enjoy eating good food all the time. I used to only eat salads, but having someone cook so well for me has really opened my eyes," Nicole responded before burping a little, "This is great *Belch* Woopsies excuse me!"

Both women laughed, drank some beer and continued with their day of relaxing.
132112.title: Partying is exhausting

choices: The next day at Jennifers house
1321123.content:
Both of the ladies had admittedly grown rather lonely this summer. Sure they both enjoyed going out, meeting new people and old friends, but everyone was treating them differently. The money changes your life forever. Nicole often found herself buying multiple rounds, buying dinner, giving gifts to people she barely knew. Nicole needed a break. Luckily, Jess was just walking up the drive way now, and she wasn't empty handed. Jess was sporting a matching pink sweatsuit with her tummy exposed, it wasn't large enough to attract attention yet, but Jess's new love of food might just sneak up on her. Speaking of food, in Jess's arms were two boxes of pastries, one with a dozen doughnuts and the other with a dozen strudels, while she also had a cookie dough doughnut amazingly held in her mouth.

"Nic! I brought these from that new vegan bakery, you'd think that make 'em healthier but I think they're actually worse for you than normal doughnuts... *munch*... either way they're friggin delicious, have some!"
Nicole eagerly walked over and took a look at the doughnuts. She grabbed a chocolate glaze and felt bliss as it practically melted in her mouth.

"Mmmmm...oh my goodness wow these are amazing... wow Jess great call.." Nicole could barely form a proper sentence. These pastries were too tasty not to enjoy. Her and Jess barely exchanged any real information for the first 20 minutes of their Friday morning. A few grunts, out loud moans of pleasure from both girls.
Soon, both girls were sitting, Nicoles pants undone to make room for her full belly, pastry all over her face which kept releasing small belches from her very invasive gut. Jess had unzipped her crop top hoodie revealing her white crop top which had chocolate and strawberry stains all over it with her very full looking belly underneath it. Jess looked absolutely finished from this breakfast. She did eat more than Nicole, and Jess has been less than eager thinking about what damage she's already done to her figure since retiring.

Both women went to the living room, where Nicole put on an episode of their latest comedy show binge, and the women lounged off their heavy meals for an hour or so. Eventually, Jess repositions herself in her chair to look more directly at Nicole and says, "I totally got distracted by the food this morning, but after the wine we had last night, when I was in my town car, I called Jen to see what she had been up to!" Ah, Ms. Jennifer Colton. As the smallest and the youngest teacher at Hill-Haven Elementary, the lottery win was quite substantial. She was in her mid 20s, was single, very pretty, and a retired teacher/multi millionaire. Nicole had wondered what Jen was up to, considering the fact that she must've been going through something similar.

"That's fantastic!" Nicole responded, still a little dazed from her massive feast. "What did she say?"Nicole asked, interested in hearing how it's been for another winner.

"She wants to meet up! She said she'd love to have us over. So I hope you don't mind, but I set up dinner at her house tomorrow night! She's going to try and get Allison to come, get the gang back together!" Jess responded ecstatically.

"Well that's fine with me! Although I think I may need a new outfit... wanna go to the mall?" Nicole asked, remaining in denial as to why she needed a new outfit.

"Yeah! I need to new clothes too, plus maybe we can grab some Lunch there! They have great pretzels, and there's that new burger place! Oh and maybe I'll pick up some dessert for later from that bakery there, they have amazing cakes..." Jess was getting her things together while thinking about the tasty snacks. Nicole knew she needed to watch her figure, but Jess was a bit of a bad influence on her.

They do have great cake though... Nicole thought to herself.
1321123.title: Money changes people

choices: Jen discovers a new rich lifestyle...
13211232.content:
It was a gorgeous day. The sun was setting earlier in the night, but right now the sunset colours were magnificent. Where Jen lived, the landscape was accented wonderfully by the sun, and the houses were massive and looked more like art installations rather than homes. As Nicole and Jess's town car pulled up, Nicole became amazed at the home they were seeing. It was huge. Jess and Nicole owned huge homes too, but this place was almost a palace. It was a large open land and a large modern home in the middle. As the women got out of the car, the main doors began to open and out came Jen, except she had changed.

Jen was still short, but now was incredibly toned and in shape. She clearly had been using her wealth and time to work out, and it showed immensely. and Nicole began to feel insecure of her minor weight gain. Jess's biggest worry was what dinner was going to be, hopefully not celery,Jess thought to herself, laughing a tiny bit out loud.

"Holy shit girl! Look at you! You're a model!" Jess said loudly and excitedly. "Give me a hug!"

Jen enjoyed this welcoming, as she walked down the stairs and hugged both the girls. As she welcomed them in, Jen began to explain to them what she's been up to since winning the money.

"At first, I had all this money, and I had no idea what to do, but my dad told me to invest in a company I believed in, and invest in them. He thought I should do something I loved, so I found this company here in California, and they're a fitness company. They weren't very big when I found them, and I wanted to finally have a body that wasn't so flat, so I invested a lot of money over time into the company. They're called, "FitWhits". I really loved them, and I became the spokesperson because I used their products to look like this. Anyways, the company blew up, like huge. We have gyms all over the country, and we're only growing. I ended up already making back my money, and I made even more too, so then I bought this house, and I've been modelling often too!"

Jess and Nicole were shocked about this. Jen had been so productive, she had made even more money than before. Jess then asked Jen, as nicely as possible, "I hope this isn't rude, but how much have you made now?"

"Oh not rude at all, I know you guys aren't trying to take my money after all haha" Jen giggled, Nicole realized that Jen appeared as lonely as they were since winning the money. "I've made in total, around $400 million, and it's going up really fast. You guys should do this with a company too! I'll totally help you, it's nice having a little work and a whole company to your name."

Jess and Nicole looked at each other, not minding the idea. "If I could pick, I'd buy a restaurant chain, or just different themed ones, so I'll have a great dinner anywhere in California..." Jess laughed a little, but appeared to be day dreaming about it.

"You should! I know someone who can help you with restaurants, I'll give you his number!" Jen said, while digging into her purse for her phone. The ladies finally found the dining room, where a large table was waiting for them. A chef and wait staff stand ready for them. Jen then explains the dinner, "Tonight, whatever you'd like, they'll make for you. And don't be afraid to try anything from Chefs menu, they're his speciality items, so get lots to try. I also have beer, wine, and other liquors, so whatever you'd like our bartender here will serve you." Jen said happily. Jess immediately started ordering, "Can I have some mozza sticks? I'd love to try your turkey here, and a steak as well. Your mashed potatoes, and I want lots of gravy." Jess says, putting the menu down, she looks at the bartender, "I'd like to start with beer, I'll have a few, I'll take wine for dinner, and I never want an empty drink. Thank you." Jess then holds onto the menu, indicating she may still order more.

Nicole wanted to hold back, so she ordered light. "I'll take a salad, and Id love some pasta as well. And can I get some wine now? That's all thanks." Nicole begins handing back the menu when Jess interrupts, "Hey no! You need to order real food! Utilize the team here, get lots of things to try!"

Jen begins to defend Nicole, "I was going to eat something similar to Nicole..." Jen pauses though, beginning to like Jess's idea. "You know what Jess, you're right. We should enjoy, I have to diet so often, this feels like the right night to let loose a little. You should too Nicole, get anything you want!"

Nicole begins to feel pressured, but begins to like the idea of giving in, after all, if Jen is, then there's no shame, right?
"Ok, I'll have pizza too, and I'll take steak too, and some lobster, and I'd love to have some tacos too, is that possible?" The chef just smiles and nods.

"That's the spirit! Ok, my turn. I'll have the mac and cheese, and can I get some chicken nuggets too? And some pizza, and I'd love steak and potatoes too! Also, can I have a burger? And some wings too. And I'll take beer to start, wine and vodka later! Oh and lets get some shots too, lets party!" Jen listed off, yelling and looking very happy.

The women began taking a few shots in a row, Jess shotgunning a beer and getting Jen too as well. Nicole began to remember about Allison, who was supposed to be there that night.

"Hey Jen, did you ever hear back from Allison?" Nicole asked Jen, who just finished her fourth shot.

"She said she was in another country, but she'll let us know when she's in town again." Jen answered rather slurred from the drinking. Just then the food was announced and all three women rushed to the dinning room awaiting their food. The table was full, full of everything they had asked for, in huge portions. Multiple burgers, wings, pizzas, steak and a huge pile of mashed potatoes. This feast was massive, and all the girls were shocked at the food in front of them. The alcohol had affected them to think less about the calorie intake, and more about feeling the warmth delicious taste this meal was about to bring to them. And so, without warning, they sat and began inhaling whatever inspired them. Jess started with potatoes, where she began dumping her loads of extra butter and gravy all over them, at one point she even began pouring the gravy into her mouth as a joke. A delicious joke... Either way, Jess was going full hog. She didn't hold back, trying to eat as much as possible. She had begun to really enjoy the sensation of a full belly, and enjoyed eating until she couldn't anymore. This wasn't unusual for her anymore, but before the money, Jess didn't really crave food this much. Granted, she had her own slight issues with weight, but since her divorce, she tried to stay in shape for the next man she'd find. But money changed that, she discovered what food can be, and she can't seem to stop eating like this. Worse yet, Jess hasn't looked at her weight in a while, but while she's afraid of looking at the dreaded number her feelings on her increased frame wasn't as negative as she thought. She doesn't totally mind the weight, especially when she gets to eat so much food. The trade off wasn't too bad in her opinion.

Nicole during this whole feast basically blacked out. She awoke to an almost empty table, with Jess sitting across from her, grabbing her exposed and very full belly, burping every couple seconds, holding a slice of pizza in her hand, stuffing it down even though she appears to have hit her limit. Nicole was shocked to witness this transformation of Jess. Sure Jess wasn't fat yet, but she had embraced the pig lifestyle. Jess's clothes were stained, open and exposed. She had food over her face, and looked like a zombie in her food comatose state. But while Nicole was shocked about Jess, only then did she began to see the damage on her own figure. Her pants undone, her shirt buttons popped off her open gut, her own clothes stained with food. Nicole couldn't really remember too much, just that ate until she physically passed out. Nicole noticed the empty wine bottle next to her, and the half dozen beer bottles next to Jess, as well as an empty wine bottle. That's when Nicole noticed Jen, who was at the end of the table. She had eaten herself to sleep. She was wearing a gorgeous dress, but she had apparently taken it off during the binge. Jen sat against the wall, with multiple wine bottles around her, multiple beer bottles around her too, with only underwear on. She was covered in food scraps, with a full belly on her lap. Jen had really gone all in on the food. It looks like she even finished a cake where she's sitting.

That was quite the feast.
13211232.title: The next day at Jennifers house

choices: Let's go back to the school
132112321.content:
A few weeks after the first get together with Jen, and things had really changed for the ladies. First off summer had officially come and gone, the weather started to cool down, Jess, Jen and Nicole relaxing and enjoying food/drinks before September came. School had started back up and Jess and Jen weren't anywhere close to schools. Nicole however, had gone back. The past few weeks had been some of the best of the summer, but Nicole was happy to be helping kids again. Especially since she donated her time, and donated a great deal of money to better the school. They have a lot better supplies, and the building has been redone, and one thing Nicole enjoys a lot is the new cafeteria. Better food, nice seating, flat screens in the teachers lounge. The staff had definitely come to enjoy these changes as well. The food had increased moods across the school, one of the few people enjoying this feature more than Nicole was in fact the Principal, Mrs. Dunn.

Mrs. Dunn is in her mid 40s, she is Caucasian, with brown hair done up and glasses that give her a stern appearance. Students and staff alike are afraid of Mrs. Dunn, she likes it that way. Since donating all this money though, Nicole has seen a different side of Mrs. Dunn. She smiles at Nicole now, even stops to talk. She's always thanking Nicole for the help and the supplies, but one thing Mrs. Dunn appreciates is the new lunch menu. Currently Mrs. Dunn was sitting at her desk, a mostly empty lunch tray sits on her desk, she's watching TV and casually doing paperwork. The rappers show she ate two slices of pizza, a muffin, some breadsticks, pop to drink and a slice of cake for dessert. Since the menu change, Mrs. Dunn has eaten more than she ever has in her life. Nicole did make sure the chefs were good (a selfish reason, mostly) and wanted kids to have choices. Staff ate free as well, which is maybe why Mrs. Dunn was eating so much. Regardless, her frame was expanding.

Nicole was walking into her office, as she opened the door she saw Mrs. Dunn taking the last bite of her cake, and pushing the tray aside.

"Nicole! How are you doing dear? Here for our meeting?" Mrs. Dunn asked cheerfully, stifling a burp at the end.

"I'm doing well, Mrs. Dunn." Nicole responded, while observing her boss's desk. There were candy wrappers, opened bags of chips, and some old food containers on her desk. It had appeared she had been eating a lot today. Nicole noticed that Mrs. Dunn had a slight double chin. Mrs. Dunn has only experienced the cafeteria for a couple of weeks, so her frame is mostly the same, but Nicole could swear she see's it getting tighter. It's only a matter of time.

"I had some numbers I wanted to run by you, if you don't mind?" Nicole finishes, going to sit down with the principal.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------


While Nicole was back to work, Jess and Jen were having different adventures. Jen decided to take a few weeks off after her dinner with Jess and Nicole. Jen wanted to enjoy her friends who didn't judge her about her money. Jen enjoyed sleeping in, eating a hearty breakfast, enjoying her day, her own way. Jen would go back after this little break, but she needs the time off. While Jen has been lounging, she's also been helping Jess with a business idea. Jess has been meeting with savvy business people from around California, and finding out what restaurant she wants to invest in. Jess and Jen would travel around the area and try different foods, seeing what Jess wanted to believe in. Eventually, Jess figured out the business, and rushed to Nicoles place to tell her.

"NIC! NIC! I have great news!" Nicole could tell it was Jess running up to her door, as she opened it still yelling about this apparent good news. Jess was holding an empty burger wrapper in her hand, running into the kitchen to find Nicole, while Jen is walking in slower, eating the rest of a burger.

"What is it, Jess?!" Nicole responded, excited to hear.

"I'm officially an investor in a restaurant! And with my money, we're making it a chain! It's going all over the United States Nic! I'm gonna be huge! I can't wait for this to make me even more money, and don't worry Nic, Jen and I will help you start a business too! That way you can get even more income! You can donate more to more schools too!" Jess was so excited for herself and her friends. "Oh, here's the name!" Jess passes Nicole the burger wrapper, who unravels it ands reads out loud, "Thiqq Burger".

"This is so cool Jess! Congrats! What do the burgers taste like?" Nicole asked, while Jen came in still eating her burger, and passed her a bag, filled with burgers. "Have one and find out." Jen remarked.

Nicole eagerly unwrapped the burger and took a bite. It was greasy, it was big, and it was the best burger Nicole had ever had in her life.

"Holy Fuck." Nicole said, taking another bite quickly and chowing down on the burger.

"They're good right? I've eaten 10 today, Jen is on number 9." Jess says, patting her belly slightly while looking at Jen, who was completely lost in her food.

"Just imagine guys, unlimited burgers on me. All over the place. I got these special cards, I get to give them to people I like, so there you go. It's always free with that card."

Jess hands them both a card that says "THIQQ BURGER SUPER MEMBER".

Nicole began to realize what this meant, Jess and Jen eating all the time. Nicole knows she has no will power around them too. Food is everywhere in Nicoles life, she needs to be careful if she wants to keep her figure.
132112321.title: Jess starts a Business

1321123211.content:
Big things were happening in these women's lives. Jess's business was taking off better than anticipated. Thiqq burger was gaining ground fast, and making headlines all across the country as "Americas next big Burger Chain". This business was the first burger joint using cloned meat. All stores did it themselves, so every burger was always guaranteed to be great. It was the next big craze in the U.S, and Jess was on her way to becoming a fast food mogul. Jen was still taking time from her real work. Her business was still growing every day, she didn't really need to be involved. Jen also knew that she had been gaining weight though. She couldn't deny it anymore. Jen looked at the scale, and it was harsh. 132 lbs. How could I let this happen? I knew I gained some weight but this is 18 pounds! Jen thought, while grabbing her extra curves. I don't totally mind this though, maybe I should just throw in the towel? Or I can try and lose the weight, maybe I'll do it as promo! Jen began planning a weight loss system with her trainers, and talking with her people about her PR stunt. They were on board and needed time before they officially go for it. Which to Jen meant time to eat as much as possible since it's about to go away forever.

While Jen ate relentlessly so did Jess. Jess as well had been growing in the passing weeks. She enjoyed fast food all the time. Plus she had them innovate back at their lab. She came up with the next menu ideas, and how to expand into other things as well. Jess would muck down multiple burgers a day, mindlessly munching on fries, and poutine, mozza sticks, chicken tenders and milkshakes. Jess even admitted she was going overboard. Jess officially weighed 150 lbs. She had never weighed this much before. Jess didn't really know how she felt. She wasn't happy about getting fat, but food really was too good to stop eating. She knew she had to do something, but she kept putting it off.


Nicole was still working hard at the school. She had donated a lot of things to the school, including a new deal with Thiqq burger. They made the entire menu for the school now, which people were hesitant about, but since it happened everyone agrees they prefer the new menu. Especially Mrs. Dunn.

Before, Mrs. Dunn was almost a stick. She was stern, firm and edgy. She wasn't very comforting looking. Since the new food changes, she has definitely filled out. Mrs. Dunn eats immediately when she arrives. She eats breakfast food, while snacking until a full lunch, stuffed with a few burgers, 3 slices of pizza, wings, poutine with bacon and extra curds, a couple stuffed tacos, and then a whole cake to finish it off. A lot of pop and milk is also consumed. Mrs. Dunn found that she needed help, so recently hired an assistant to help her with work, as well as deliver her non stop food. This poor assistant is named Sam. Sam is a cute, thin brunette, with short hair. She is trying become a teacher, and found this opportunity would help her advance her career. Sam isn't pleased with the situation. She feels partially responsible for Mrs. Dunns health. This woman consumes food like no other. The whole day the kitchen makes her special orders. This is, the reason Mrs. Dunn went from 110lbs to 175lbs. Her clothes are tight, she is behind on her wardrobe currently, so her clothes are showing every little detail. Mrs. Dunn doesn't seem to care though, anytime Nicole or Sam ask why she's so hungry she just explains her new love for food. Nicole understood though, she too was growing. Nicole finally stepped on the scale, to reveal her new weight of 140lbs. She had put on 30lbs, and she was afraid of not being able to stop. What if I can't control myself? What if I end up like Mrs. Dunn? Nicole was still eating more than she should, and frequent stops at Thiqq Burger weren't helping. She ate breakfast, lunch and dinner there. It was too good not too, plus they were always expanding their menu. They were becoming more than just burgers...


While Nicole was at the school one day, an old friend she hadn't seen in a while showed up during her spare period. The door opened for Nicole to see a large woman. She is in her mid 40s, brown hair, glasses, a decent double chin. This woman has large breasts, and she is short, so she has a shelf as an ass. Nicole realizes that it's indeed Mrs. Allison Wilton! The fourth lotto winner! She was larger than before, she used to be 250lbs, but Nicole bet she was in the 300 range now.

"Nicole! It's you! Come here and give me a big 'ol hug you!" Allison waddled slowly towards Nicoles desk, while Nicole got up and walked around to hug her old work colleague. The hug was very soft, her huge boobs were like padding, and she smelt like candy. Like she just ate something sweet. As Nicole pulled out Allison says to Nicole, "Nicole, how's it been? You've put on some weight I see." Nicole is shocked, and doesn't know what to say. Do you realize how fat you are? Nicole blanked, and Allison began to laugh hysterically. "Oh my, you're cute. I know I'm huge, don't worry sweetheart. I was just being funny. Why don't we grab lunch?"

They went to the local Thiqq Burger, where Allison began loading up on multiple dishes. A dozen burgers, a large poutine with a bucket of gravy, a large milkshake and 7 hot dogs loaded with bacon and cheese. Nicole held back compared to Allison. Nicole got 5 burgers, a milkshake and a fry. The girls got their food, sat down and began chowing down.

"So Nicole," Allison begins talk while preparing her meal, while Nicole watches and feels like she's about to witness a wild animal attack. "Since winning the lottery, I realized I wanted to enjoy my time here. *munch..MUnch..burP" I've always been a bigger lady, my husband has never minded, but I would diet, and do my best to stay healthy. *mmm* Since this money came into my life, I've realized I can afford to be *sips milkshake* unhealthy." Allison then proceeds to takes an enormous bite from the burger, moaning while she does. Nicole can swear she can see her clothes stretching in front of her. "I want live my life to the fullest. *burppp* I gave most of money to a company that is working on reducing health risks for obesity, and the rest of my money I use for travelling, *chomp...munch..mm* my kids and my husband. I've eaten everything I've ever wanted, or so to speak *burrrp* hahaha.. I could never get enough food. I'm a greedy woman, Nicole. *bUUrrrPP* This is where my money is going. It's eye opening, I hope you and the others do the same. This whole school has put on weight since we left. It's only going to grow. When my company is done, there won't be any reason to not eat whatever you want." Allison then begins to eat faster, too fast to speak at the same time. Nicole keeps eating her meal, unsure of how to feel. She can't deny she's envious of Allison and her attitude, but that doesn't mean she can just give in. How is she supposed to keep children educated?

Allison had her order expanded for more poutine with even more gravy, she wanted 4 more burgers, and 5 more hot dogs loaded with all the greasiest things that they had. Allison continued to eat, more and more, popping buttons and gorging. Nicole ended up buying more as well. She felt weird to just watch Allison, so she thought eating would help. It did since Nicole began to eat more and more. Hot dogs, burgers, ribs, wings, apple pie and cake too. Allison also ordered more dessert for herself and Nicole. The two ate for hours. Eventually Allison called it.

"I'm all done, sweetheart. I know you liked eating that much though, dear. Trust me, this is what you wanna do. I'm happy as a hog. Goodbye dear, I'll see you soon! I'm going to catch up with Jen and Jess soon enough as well!" And with that, Allison lifted her huge body up and walked to her husbands vehicle. Nicole went home, where she slept off the food, and maybe ate some ice cream too.
1321123211.title: We Finally Meet Allison

choices: Nicole gets her friends together—boy how they've changed...
Trying to control her appetite isn't easy at the new and "improved" school
Instant Gratification: Jess does, indeed, become the Fattest Lottery Winner™
13211232112.content:
As time passed, Nicole did her best to stay busy.

It seemed like everyone else had things going for them, why not her? Even though she was rich enough to afford it, she liked her job at the school. She had always wanted to be a teacher, and without the stress that came with the depressingly low salary that teaching provided her, she was free to throw herself into her career. Especially now that she wasn't just a teacher, she was a donor—every time she looked around at the improvements that her money had made in the school, she felt proud. That was plenty enough reason to keep pouring more time and effort into her job. She wasn't going to get rich off of it like her friends were off of their jobs, but this was rewarding!

Besides, she'd already struck rich once.

With everyone working at their own paces, keeping up with her fellow lottery winners became something of a hassle. Jen and Jess had their own entrepreneurial endeavors to attend to while Allison was otherwise occupied seeing the world and, apparently, stuffing her face. The four of them didn't meet up often, at least for a while.

In that time, Nicole had done her best to restrain herself. It was hard, with how much she had grown to love cooking. Thiqq Burger was delicious, offered an increasing amount of options, and it wasn't like she couldn't afford it. She did her best to stop by only once a day, but her best often came about once a week. Her plumping physique only continued to expand in the coming weeks and months since she'd last seen Allison and her other friends. She had been hesitant to meet Jess for lunch—the tightness of her new pink sweater really emphasized the roundness of her belly. Her jeans, brand new, had already started to bare at the thighs. She was getting so chubby lately, she was almost worried about what her friends might think of her! Tipping the scales at almost one hundred and seventy pounds, she felt like such a whale...

Until, of course, she actually met Jess Haskell for lunch.

After winning all this money, it was obvious that they were going to let themselves go a bit. Allison had done enough for all of them, but Nicole had been watching with a wary eye as Jess slowly chubbed up alongside her. Being an investor in Thiqq Burger, and all the benefits that came with, was a mighty responsibility indeed, and it had proven useful for far more than one occasion. She'd always been worried about what would have happened if she'd been the one to invest in that company instead of Jess. The thin, freckle-faced woman had played it so fast and loose with her benefits, Nicole doubted that she'd ever be able to reign herself in with that much access to delicious, scrumptious food...

"Nikki!" Jess held her hands up high, "Come, sit, I got started without you."

Jess had gotten fat. In the few months it had been since they'd seen one another, Nicole had managed to put on about thirty pounds. Jess looked to have matched that and a half. That same thin, freckle-faced teacher was slowly being swallowed up by chubby cheeks and a double chin. A round, proud belly rested on her plush thighs as she sat at the dinner table on her expensive patio. She didn't rise to meet Nicole, lest she part with the lunch that she had already heartily partaken in.

"I... can see that!" Nicole laughed awkwardly at the sight, "Jess! You look..."

"Great, I know." the older woman sniffed, taking a meaty bite out of something that looked particularly delicious, "It's this new skin treatment I'm trying—come on and sit!"

Nicole shuffled awkwardly towards the patio table. It was covered in food, all from Thiqq Burger. Even though it lacked the trimmings of a fast food binge, such as bags and containers, Nicole knew it well enough by smell. Had Jess been eating nothing but Thiqq Burger since she became an investor? She certainly had the figure to show for it...

Not that Nicole was one to talk...

They caught up as well as they could over lunch. It was a little... harder to talk to Jess. Nicole had done her best to stay grounded, despite the money and the changes she'd made to her living arrangements. Meanwhile Jess, as her business continued to boom and her wallet expand, seemed to get a little airy. A little flighty, as it were.

"So did you see Allison before she left for Germany?"

"Boy did I—she was huge."

"Ohhhh, weeeelll..."

Nicole swallowed and grimaced at the hypocrisy of Jess's comment. She had never cared much about weight before all of this Newly Rich thing started, but it seemed to be so prevalent now. It was so strange to see all of her friends steadily puff up, but it felt even stranger to talk about it. Behind their backs none the less.

"Kinda." Nicole finally said, "I mean, she seems happy about it..."

"Pssh, yeah." Jess snorted, "I'm just happy to know that I'm not the fattest winner of this lottery."

She dipped her chicken in heavy ranch dressing, coating it twice over in the stuff before taking a greedy bite. Ranch dolloped on her full right breast, and she used one perfectly manicured finger to scoop it up.

"I could eat like a cow all I want and never get that fat."

Her thoughts turned to the rapidly widening Ms. Dunn, who crammed food into her face with the same fervor and talent that her friends seemed to have. Admittedly, it was nice to know that, even though she'd been doing some expanding of her own, she was far dwarfed by her formerly hard-nosed principal, swiftly softening into a super-sized sow.

Even still, that wasn't exactly nice.

"Anyway—" Nicole changed the subject, "So have you seen Jen?"

"What? No, too busy." Jess smacked her lips, "Power lunches, corporate meetings, fancy dinners, you know how it is."

"I was hoping to meet with her soon too." Nicole said with a smile, "I miss you guys! I liked it when we all worked together."

"Aww, I miss you guys too!" Jess cooed, quickly correcting herself, "As in you guys, not the school. God, I never realized how much I hated teaching."

"It's not that bad."

"It's a lot worse than sitting on my butt all day." Jesse laughed, making her belly slosh, "But we should all totally meet up."

The two of them embraced, their tummies colliding in a soft squishy hug. Nicole left Jess exactly where she was sitting when she arrived, sitting at the table on her patio. And just like when she had arrived, Jess was eating.
13211232112.title: the Idle Rich

132112321122.content:
2 months later

Northern California was quickly becoming a different place, obviously over 2 the changes seem minor enough, but this lottery win has unintentionally impacted modern day society more than anyone could've predicted. Starting with the very idea of food. Due to the incredibly low cost for Thiqq Burger, Jess and the board wanted to use the large profit margin to their advantage. Jess had realized the potential for their business beyond fast food. Why not Chinese food? Pizza Parlours? Bakery's? Jess and the team went hard at work to build theme restaurants, but Jess also wanted to make a themeless buffet. A restaurant that can make you virtually any meal. This dream, while possible, was tough considering they had to create and perfect recipes. This a rather large contributing factor to Jess's recent weight gain. Her greed was evolving beyond food as well, Jess wanted to dominate the entire food market with her product, and at the rate their business is growing it seems like a potential possibility.

Of course, this made Jess a great deal of money personally, so much that she saw to it to spend it on more business ideas. Jess was making so much money, she invested a ton of her money into Allisons company because of her new-found interest in medical research for obesity. Over the last two months, Allison and Jess partnered Thiqq Burger and Allisons research business into one company, Harrow Inc. This company is planning on changing the world very fast, and so, in such a short time, Harrow Inc. food stores began popping up everywhere in Northern California (all of which gave free food to all four lotto winners). Such places like Chinese restaurants, and Bakery's that custom made any cake on the spot, as well as Pizza Parlours, poutinerys and ice cream parlours. They were in plenty of schools, such cheap food was great for keeping costs low and spirits high with the great food. This fast influx of cheap, guilt free and delicious food began to dominate the cities across the northwest, and already they are expanding fast.


As both of the ladies made tons of money, they also ate more than either of them had ever expected they could. Jess had broken 200 quickly 2 months ago, and while she was aware of it, she couldn't find a reason to care. 200 didn't seem terribly big to her, especially with a person like Allison next to her. The denial that Jess had was very apparent because of this, and so she continued to eat at lightning speeds. Jess had packed on 35 pounds in 2 months, but considering all of the new food to taste test, her and Allison gave themselves an excuse to gorge, it was for the good of the company, after all. Speaking of Allison, she was a sight to behold as well. 35 pounds for Jess, but 42 pounds for Allison, putting her at a total weight of 365 pounds. Allison was an unstoppable force against food. It seemed like she never stopped. Her husband enjoyed every minute, becoming obsessed with his wifes weight. Allison would eat breakfast in bed for about an hour, eating stacks of waffles drenched in syrup, while putting back 2 strips of bacon at a time. Allison would get out of bed slowly. She'd get ready for day, snacking on pastries scattered around the house, and once ready would get her driver to stop at whatever restaurant(s) she felt she needed. She'd arrive at the Harrow Inc. headquarters and be walked inside, where Jess would meet her. They would do their 1 o'clock meeting, and then after taste test the daily recipes. This was Jess and Allison's favourite time. They got to eat almost endlessly, for a couple of hours until both women are checked out and return home. Both women would snack until they fall asleep for the evening (late night snacks weren't uncommon though either).


All of the food was affecting more than just these two however, it was affecting almost everyone who ate their food. People in town were putting on weight all over the place. This was something especially Nicole was seeing. Hill-haven Elementary was becoming a drastically different school than it used to be, inside and out. The students of all ages appeared to be getting larger, but even then, it seemed the entire staff was being affected by the new cafeteria. First Ms. Harper, a heavier woman with a large rear and modest belly in her late 40's, used to weigh roughly 200 pounds, maybe a bit more. Since the new food, Ms. Harper began putting away much greasier food than Nicole was used to. Surely she ate unhealthy like an average person, but now she was losing all self control. Nicole saw Ms. Harper only yesterday eat 3 burgers, and a large poutine. Ms. Harpers ass had expanded exponentially in such a short time, putting on 50ish pounds. Ms. Harpers boobs were much larger, and her belly becoming a noticeable double, easy to say she was plumping up quickly. But not only her, the math teacher Mrs. Singh, used to be around 150, and now she's easily passed the 200 mark. Her hair done back, only recently to hair from getting in her mouth. Mrs. Singh seemed to have a sweet tooth, and heavily enjoyed eating cake, pie, cookies etc. fairly frequently. Mrs. Singh would also "make the my favourite number is Pie! haha" before grabbing a slice and wolfing it down. And those weren't the only staff members either, almost every teacher and faculty member has put on weight, some more than others, but it seems the trend is only increasing.

One particular faculty member, is of course, Mrs. Dunn.

Mrs. Dunn was a sight to behold. Over the past two months of getting great food all over town, Mrs. Dunn was growing at an alarming rate. At a stunning 240 mark, Mrs. Dunn was putting on weight at an almost impossible amount. It was likely due to the fact that she barely stopped eating even after work. Her car is filled with wrappers from Thiqq Burger and other Harrow Inc. restaurants. Some would say she's part of the reason the school has put on weight, since she loves working on their menu with Jess and Allison over lunch. Nicole was also at lunch, but they mostly either talked about food, or didn't talk due to the enormous enormous appetites the women have. Recently Nicole hasn't gone, due to the major temptations and peer pressure. Both women push food on Nicole like there's no tomorrow, and she can't handle all the temptation.


Currently, Nicole is at home, lounging on the couch, munching on vegetable chips. Her investor called and explained that she's spending too much money on the charity, and soon enough she'll lose too much of her fortune. However, he had a plan for her.

"Wait," Nicole asked confused, "You think I should do what?"

"It's simple, I'm watching the market right now, and I found a weed company that you can buy. You offer your friends at Harrow to make superb edibles, and you make royalties and own a weed company. What do ya say?"

Nicole thought for a moment, what's so bad about this, right? It's legal here now, and it'll bring in plenty of money for the kids at so many schools.

"I'm in." Nicole responds confidently, with a slight smirk from making a bold choice.

"Perfect! I'll keep looking for more business, we may as well keep making more, you can keep donating as much as you want after all. Anyways, I'm gonna make some calls. Bye, go and celebrate!"

And with that, she's back to munching on veggie chips, bored watching more TV. Nicole had been getting better with her will power slowly. Nicole weighed 180 pounds, so only putting on 10 pounds in the 2 months. Nicoles belly was beginning to jiggle more and more, while her thighs expanded as well. She didn't fully hate it, her breasts were bigger, and she didn't mind looking a little fuller, but she passed that a while ago, and doesn't want to be unhealthy, she does need to teach students.
132112321122.title: Trying to control her appetite isn't easy a...

1321123211221.content:
Owning a full on Weed Company wasn't something that Nicole predicted she'd be doing ever. The company, named, "High Hopes Farm" was a funny name, but it just happened to be a lucky time to buy the business, as she immediately made money back. The plan to make edibles with Jess and Allison was brilliant, as it changed the game for all of them. Soon enough she just joined into the Harrow Inc. family anyways, and boy oh boy was it wonderful. Once Nicole started making money, she gave more than before to schools and children's foundations. Real change was being seen by Nicole once this had happened. She began giving the charities and foundations her all and was working all the time. Nicoles private Chef was told only make healthy options, and with little time to lounge, Nicole actually wasn't gaining weight. In fact, she was eating better, working out now too, and working non stop. Nicole was actually losing some weight from before. She felt good knowing that she was actually fighting her cravings and winning now too!

While Nicole was losing weight and feeling great working for the cause, Allison and Jess capitalized on their new Weed business. Since the company was growing, people's opinion of Harrow Inc. was fairly positive, and it was only going up with more great food options. Once they started selling pot, people began to give into their urges of laziness. Burgers that made you eat more and more, it was a dangerous game for people already addicted to the food. Jess is a prime example.

Currently, Jess is sitting in her office chair at the headquarters, taking a large juicy bite from a double cheeseburger infused with weed. Her dress shirt stained and unbuttoned almost entirely, minus two in the middle of her cleavage and her belly. Her pale skin was very exposed, and her posture was slouched back extremely, while she cradled her very bulging belly. One hand grasping her full and taught gut, one hand holding a messy juicy burger, her face in ecstasy while being so high and so full. Dozens of wrappers are littered on her floor. Gorging and feeling in bliss, Jess opened her drawer and pulled out her vibrator, she began to pleasure herself multiple times in a row, until she collapsed in her chair, exhausted and sweaty she slowly falls asleep. This new idea is Jess's latest addiction. She has become aware of new greedy feelings towards things other than food, and has begun to latch onto them as well.


Similar and not surprising, Allison is in her own office, on her couch after doing something similar enough to Jess. Allison and her husband enjoy stuffing sessions at any time of the day, so lately Allison hasn't stopped eating, even more than usual. Her Pants fully undone and her face covered in cake and other foods, her husband has trays upon trays of food for Allison to eat. She is in heaven.


Both women continuing to increase weight and appetites, it seems that neither have any intention of slowing down anytime soon...
1321123211221.title: The Weed Farm

choices: Wake up: Nicole assesses the damage...
Harrow Inc. has a BIG announcement to make...
13211232112211.content:
Over all this time, Jen has remained out of the womens picture. Whenever anyone called, she was confirm she was okay, but that she was in another country working. Taking the time off had her get behind, and she was keeping the appearances up for her brand. Nicole wondered about her weight, if her company was mad at how much she had put on. Nicole had been using "FitWhits" to lose weight, and found it worked well for her. Nicole was down to about 160, and she was proud of herself. While the rest of the world around her fattened up, she was dropping her pounds. Nicole and Jen had been talking, and Nicole wanted to surprise Jen with her weight loss from FitWits. Jen was finally around for a weekend, and so Nicole went over for lunch.

At the front door Nicole was let in and walked to the kitchen. Sure enough, there was Jen. She is drop dead gorgeous, more in shape than she was the first time Nicole had seen her since winning the lottery. Jen had an amazing figure, she was more shapely, and still looked stunning as ever. Jen looked amazing.

"Holy shit Jen, look at you! You're so hot!" Nicole blurted out loud, relieved her friend is on the fitness side of things as well.

Jen laughed at Nicoles comment, "Nic, look at you girl, you lost weight! You look great! Have a glass of wine and let's catch up."

The girls drank and talked about the weed business, and Jen explained where she had been the whole time.

"You see, I really friggin loved the food. I really wasn't a fan of the idea of stopping... but I own a fitness company, and I'm known for my fitness lifestyle. I had to get out while I could, so I made a P.R. stunt and dropped the weight, made a vlog. The company really liked it, it boosted out numbers." Jen says, "I miss eating whatever I want haha, but let's face it, it's too unhealthy."

Nicole knows, and thinks about everyone else she knows increasing in mass. Both girls proceed to eat a light and green dinner, which both enjoyed, but they both secretly wanted Thiqq Burger. Nicole went home, continued to drink a whole bottle of wine while smoking a joint or two, and maybe eat a little burger or something small.....
13211232112211.title: Where is Jen?

132112321122112.content:
"NIC! Nic oh my goodness, you need to meet us at the headquarters, I promise you don't want to miss it!"

Nicole woke up slowly, her head was hurting, and Jess's loud phone call wasn't helping. Nicole slowly rose, she noticed an empty bottle of wine, empty beer bottles, an ash tray, and a large amount of Thiqq Burger wrappers. She must've guessed somewhere around 13, she didn't want to know. I'm gonna leave that for the maid and call it a one off... I gotta get changed...

On the way to the headquarters, Nicole asks her driver if he'd make a detour to a Thiqq Burger on the way, which then lead her hungover brain to order 5 burgers, mega fries poutine supreme with 3 different types of bacon, chicken, sausage, and eggs too. In the order was also a mega sized pop and some mozza sticks as well. By the time she made it to Harrow Inc. Headquarters, her food was done and her shift was tight. She was feeling very gassy, but better with the hangover satisfied... for now anyways.


Nicole made it towards the front desk, observing the building on her way. It's big and bold, very futuristic. The building had a great deal of people. Some in lab coats, some in suits and formal attire. Nicole noticed something about the people, some were also swollen looking, in fact, most were. It appeared even here people embraced the side effects of eating this food so often. As Nicole approached the front desk, she looked at the secretary. Mid 20's, very pretty, but looks like she's outgrowing her outfit. Nicole noticed this woman was even physically showing her own discomfort. The sleeves on her shirt were tight on her fat pudgy arms. More examination and Nicole see's wrappers in her garbage, they're over flowing the can onto the floor, which leads Nicole to see just the corner of what looked like a cake.

"Mmph. How can I help you" The woman said, clearly having a little food in her mouth, she quickly swallows it.

"I'm here to see Jess Haskall, and Allis-"

"Is your name Nicole?" The secretary says interrupting Nicole.

"Oh, um yes. Nicole Smith." Nicole hands over her ID, and gets it back.

"Follow greg here, he'll take you to them." The woman smiles and gestures towards a man in a suit.

"Thank you!" Nicole says walking away, looking back a few seconds later to see the secretary chomping down on her whole cake. My goodness, so many people are losing it. Nicole thought to herself.
132112321122112.title: Harrow Inc. has a BIG announcement to make...

choices: It's a sign, eat up Nic!
"I need to work for the kids, I'm sorry, I can't."
1321123211221122.content:
"Nic! You made it!" Jess looked extremely excited to see Nicole, which made her feel nice. Her friends are still her real friends when they're not eating something.

"Yeah! It seemed urgent so came as fast as possible." Nicole replies, ignoring the part about the food detour on the way the headquarters. "So what's the news?"

"Well, here's basically the idea in a nutshell," Allison came waddling around from a wall with a clipboard and a thick list of information printed on to it in one hand, and a meaty burger in her other hand which was covered in sauce, as was her fat face. "Our labs have made one of the biggest breakthroughs in the history of healthcare, even humanity I may say." With that Allison took a large bite and chewed while sauce dripped down her chin into her large jiggly breasts. Allison was truly climbing up the scales, Nicole figured at the rate her and Jess were going, she'd have to be 400 pounds soon.

Speaking of Jess, she was also currently munching on a small snack, but her belly was hanging out of the bottom of her shirt and was clearly much too small for her, as her buttons were being pulled as tight as possible. Jess and Allison looked as though they had been eating non stop, which they really had been. Both women were hooked on the idea of feeling full and satisfied, and since the weed based food, they had entered an even deeper dimension of food.

As Allison finished her bite, she began to resume her explanation.

"Imagine a device, that cleans your bloodstream, kills all invasive cells for you, fixes and issues before they even happen. A device that essentially eliminates all harmful information in your body. Most specifically for the case of my self, a device that allows your body to be as healthy as ever no matter your weight. A world where we can all eat as we wish and feel no worry of health issues anymore... *munch*.." Allison took another large bite, then stuck the rest of the burger into her mouth, resembling a chipmunk. As she tossed the wrapper in the closest garbage, the swallowed her food, releasing a large belch while doing so. "Buuurppp.... phew, that was great.. Mark!" With that, a man walked around the pizza holding a box of doughnuts, and began to hold them for Allison. "OOhh me me me!" Jess yelled, moving fast to the sweets, jiggling her doughy gut and boobs while doing so.

"So wait a moment... what are you telling me exactly?" Nicole asked, believing she knew what this meant, but wanted them to confirm it.

"Nic, it means we're about to dominate the pharmaceutical market now too!" Jess said, taking a bite out of a pastry right after.

"Hold on dear, we're about to change the world." Allison said, giggling out of glee and greed, just thinking of what they'll do next.

"So you can get as fat as you want, and it'll be harmless? Safe?" Nicole asked.

"Absolutely! This was the plan the whole time. Now we can keep eating. Jess and I have been testing the device, it's been great. I have plenty of energy, and I still have great charts at the doctors. I love this! Allison responded, motioning to Nicole to eat.

"I'm not sure yet, maybe, let me think about it...." Nicole responded, unsure of what this meant. Why diet? It's healthy now, she can eat with her friends, feel good. Why not? But what about the students? Giving in to food, that may mean giving up on the kids.

Nicole didn't know what to do...
1321123211221122.title: News about healthy research!

choices: Time passes—Nicole manages to stay (mostly) slim
13211232112211222.content:
Nicole looked at the food that had been offered to her, and then back to her friends. Then, she took one long lingering look at the food again, and then back to her friends once more.

So much had changed since everyone had gotten this money. Her friends—simple teachers in the public education system—had become almost unrecognizable inside and out. Everything was money, money this and food, food that. In a way, Nicole missed the days when things were simple. When they would just go to the teacher's lounge and bitch about their stupid kids or how much they hated working for the federal government. Now that her friends had had their every desire, every hedonistic whim, taken care of for them and thensome, she could barely remember what they were like before they had gotten rich.

"I need to work for the kids." she finally said, with a long sad smile, "I'm sorry, but I don't think I'm the right person for this..."

The confused, dazed look behind Allison's eyes, followed by the mild irritation of Jess, said all that she needed to know about her decision. It had been the right one. She still loved teaching, warts and all. And they had, apparently, grown beyond the people that they used to be. In more ways than one, to be unsubtle about it.

Jess and Allison were far too concerned with how they could live their best lives than they were in the passion that had brought them all together in the first place—teaching.

"Well, I mean... okay." Jess's snort was more one of confusion than one of outright derision, "I mean, you know... if you change your mind you can—"

"I-I know." Nicole nodded curtly, with her best polite smile, "Speaking of, I've got to get home, grade some tests..."

"Sure sure." Allison opened wide for yet another burger, "You know the way out, right?"

***


In a manner befitting her best efforts, Nicole struggled to adjust to the life of a more lonely kind of millionaire.

It wasn' like she couldn't just go and hang out with her friends again. Far from it, actually. She got a message at least every week or so from either Jess or Allison about going to "get lunch". It was just that Nicole knew what going down that road with them would entail. She would lose herself to her own gluttony. She would lose what she loved to do, and how much she loved to teach. The pull of all that food, the bliss of their cloned meat combined with the heady high that accompanied a full belly. And with the way those two lived, all they would have her do is eat an eat and eat...

Nicole wasn't ready to sign her life away like that. Healthy or not, Nicole felt fulfilled from teaching.

That was why so much of her money had gone into making sure that it could grow leaps and bounds ahead of the rest. Her donations had helped made it the most well-funded school in their district—the state even!

Nicole couldn't turn her back on her own passion project now. Allison and Jess had their corporate tycooning, Jen had her modeling and fitness empire...

Maybe Nicole could have school.
13211232112211222.title: Declining Invitation

choices: Revealing Jess—quite literally the largest woman Nicole had ever seen!
Revealing Allison—she'd arrived, and started eating, early!
Revealing Jen—Nicole never would have thought she'd be in for this!
132112321122112221.content:
In the many months that passed after Jess and Allison's discovery, the steady impact that their lottery earnings had been having on the world around them began to intensify. In a year, so much would change.

Thiqq Burger dominated the fast food industry. Cloned meats meant that it was entirely guilt-free, and each meal was both customizable and welcomingly uniform. Customers flocked in by the corral just to get their fill of the greasy, fattening cuisine that had made both of her friends millionaires almost a hundred times over by now. Bellies filled and hung, popping buttons and spreading threads wide as girths grew at an unprecedented pace. Obesity rates skyrocketed just in time for the subject of their second money-making venture to become verified by the medical community at large.

Pun intended.

As the news of a device and pharmaceutical that, working in tandem, could nullify and negate the unsightly effects of the obesity that was becoming so commonplace, people began to indulge like never before. It was as if a haze of hunger had descended upon otherwise rational folks that told them, no, they must feed. Men, women, and children alike were beginning to sport pot-bellies at even their thinnest weights. The world was changing, rapidly, and it seemed at times that all Nicole could do was watch and try to keep her head on straight. With her means, she could have easily wound up losing herself in the craze that seemed to spread like wildfire among even the sanest members of their community.

And it was so hard.

Already quite hooked on Thiqq Burger to begin with, Nicole had spent more time trying to diet now than she had ever. Knowing that all of the ill effects of anything she might grow or eat or weigh could be taken care of with a flick of a switch and the pop of a pill made it so difficult to want to remain in control of herself. But she was doing it for herself. She wanted to teach, she wanted fulfillment, the kind that couldn't come in a greasy wrapper. She wasn't Jess, and she wasn't Allison, and she wasn't—

"Mrs. Dunn?"

The principal's entire face seemed to ripple as she snorted awake. She'd fallen asleep at her desk, again, in the middle of lunchtime, again. The poor woman was about as wide as she was tall nowadays, having never been particularly tall nor active to begin with. The months spent on her endless indulgence had only served to make her almost spherical in shape. She was a poster child for the new world that was coming to fruition—entirely consumed with consuming.

"Mm, Nicole." she said sleepily, resuming her meal exactly where she'd left off, "Come...hrmmm... to join me for.... hrffff... lunch?"

Nicole watched in equal parts concern, revulsion, and jealousy as the piggy principal of her school continued to scarf down bite after bite of Thiqq Burger cuisine. It was all she could do, some days, to even look at Mrs. Dunn. She was so committed to making an absolute balloon of herself it seemed. Even before she learned that there were literally no consequences (health consequences, anyway) to her diet, all she wanted to do was eat. Now, it seemed as if that had been her core personality trait all along.

"I was wondering if I could, um... take a half day?" Nicole gestured to her phone, "I, uh... got a message from my friends, and..."

"Oh!" the belly-built box of a woman hefted up slightly, leaning into her desk far enough for the edge to cut far into the lap of her belly folds, "I don't see why not!"

"Thank you." Nicole said with a restrained smile, "It's, um... it's Jess and Allison!"

"Oh yesyesyes..." the fat woman burbled stupidly as she sucked down a handful of fries, "Always liked them."

"They say hi." Nicole lied, "Um... I hope you don't mind?"

"After all the... hrmmm... good you do for us..." Mrs. Dunn's slow heavy voice dropped as she lost interest in the nonedible conversation, "Don't mind at all."

***


After a year of invitations, ebbing and flowing as time passed, Nicole had finally decided to meet with her friends.

It was a lonely life, her time as an incredibly rich woman beyond all belief. Her only other friends were women who were either too busy or too dangerous to be around. None of the other women at school seemed to like her for her, only her money. And none of her rich friends wanted her to be herself, it seemed.

The invitation had come last week, and Nicole had thought long and hard about whether or not she had really "forgiven" them for turning their backs on who they used to be. The friends that Nicole had known them to be, and honestly liked them better as.

Tonight would be the answer to that question.

As Nicole drove up the long, long, inconceivably long driveway and handed her car off to the chauffeur, she took the steps up to Jess's mansion with some trepidation. She was a bit out of shape—teetering at more than a few pounds over 210. Still a blindsight better than some of the other people these days, but far heavier than she would have liked to have been. Thirty pounds since last year would have been mortifying just a few years ago, but now...

Nicole shook her head, relating those kinds of thoughts to the back of her mind.

"Let's just..." she puffed as she rang the doorbell, "Get this over with..."

After a few moments, probably more than she had expected, the two front doors began to open...
132112321122112221.title: The Times, They are a'Changing

choices: Jess and Allison were seated, gorging and absolutely massive
Allison was huge, Jess wasn't that much larger?
1321123211221122213.content:
Nicole was taken aback as she began looking over her old hot and fit friend. She was wearing a very nice dress, perhaps a dress too small for her new frame. Jen looked as though she had officially relapsed on her addiction to food. Her whole body had thickened noticeably. She had a spare tire that showed off rather obviously in her dress, looking either pregnant or just plain fat, her arms were thick and meaty, jiggling as she walked towards Nicole. Jens legs were also large and jiggling with every step, as her ass wobbled back and forth as well.
