Around the 230 pound range, she was testing the limits on her jacket, as the seams were becoming visible as they stretched open. The secretary had ketchup on her upper lip, and was rubbing her very bloated gut through her tight dress shirt.

“Hi, there. My name is Nicole, I’m here to see Allison.” Nicole said with a smile. The secretary looked up at Nicole and burped quietly.

“Mmm yeah I’ll give her a call, one moment. ” The secretary lifted the phone and called the office. “Hi there, I’ve got a uh… Nicole here, for Allison? Mhm, yep will do. Ok bye.” The secretary hung up the phone and looked at Nicole again. “They’re sending security over now to escort you there. Just wait here please.” Nicole smiled, looking around the secretary's desk. She noticed Thiqq Burger wrappers popping out of a drawer. Looks like she hides her overflow in there. She thought, spotting the secretary as she tries to secretly take a large bite from a triple stacked burger. Hehe it’s always nice to see everyone else struggle like me, at least I’m not the only one who’s addicted. Eventually, security showed up and walked her to the elevator, which would take her to the top floors, otherwise known as the head offices. Nicole was out of breath and panting by the time she made it to the elevator (probably the Thiqq Burger stop she made on the way) feeling aware of her bloated body. Holy shit… she thought to herself, I can’t believe I’ve let myself get this fat… I know it’s technically healthy now but still, this is a lot of weight to move around… Nicole walked inside of the massive elevator and waited as it lifted her all the way up. Once at the top floor, she entered the massive space that was only open to the big wigs. The whole upstairs had a pool, hot tub and spa, with it’s own private buffet, plenty of entertainment, as well as tons of new tech ready to be messed around with. As Nicole walked in she spotted all of her friends sitting and waiting for her. They were all eating from the assortment of food on the table in front of them, surrounded by a few other board members and investors.

“Hey guys, I’m sorry I’m late, I got caught up in traffic.” Nicole lied, walking towards the open chair left for her.

“Nic! Not an issue, it’s good to see you! I can get started once everyone is comfy.” Nicole sat down, and Jess began to stand up, hoisting her obese body out her chair. At 430 pounds, Jess was quite a blimp, even in a room with only fat people. Her thick arms jiggled as she moved them, her massive tits bouncing like crazy over her fat and large double belly. Jess drank from her beer before starting to speak to the group.

“Okay guys, I appreciate everyone coming, I know business is boring but this is really important.” Jess started, holding her large gut with both hands. “As you know, recently I’ve been enjoying my time with Marissa, who has shown me the happiest time of my life. That said, I’ve been neglecting my role in this company. I want us to succeed, and I want us to keep becoming bigger as a company, but to be honest I don’t love being in the public eye since we became national celebrities. Which is why I would like to drop out from the board and hire a real pro in my position. I’d like to take a step back, as I just bought a massive Villa in Italy which Marissa and I will be moving to shortly.” The room fell silent. Italy? What the hell? Nicole thought to herself, before Allison started to talk.

“Wow, Jess that’s really great… I’m happy for you guys, are you really just gonna leave though? Just like that?”

“No no don’t worry! I’m keeping my house here, I just want some new sights. I wanna live with Marissa in a new place, I’m even thinking of proposing to her out there…” Jess responded, excited.

“Congrats Jess! That’s so amazing! You better come visit all of us though!” Nicole said, happy for her friend.

“Of course we’ll be back. We’ll probably be there a little while, but it’s just to get some space from everything here. Allison, is it alright if I step back though?” Allison began to talk, holding a massive burger in her fat hand.

“If you’re sure, then it’s no issue. You’ll keep all your shares as owner, just give up power to the board. I think it’d be okay.” Allison said, looking at her legal team who nodded in response. The girls all celebrated with a large lunch, while Jess filled them in on the house and their plans. As they all began to leave, they all said their goodbyes, realizing they wouldn’t see Jess for a few months. Nicole went up to Jess and hugged her old friend, crying about seeing her leave.

“You better keep in touch with me… and invite me to the wedding!” Nicole said, weeping slightly.

“It’s okay Nic, I’ll see you guys soon I know of it! And you should definitely visit too! The house looks gorgeous, I can’t wait. I love ya, Nic.” Jess said, holding her friend while crying.

“Love ya more, Jess.”
13211232112211222132121122111111.title: A Meeting is Called

choices: Jen and Nicole are Spending Time Together
132112321122112221321211221111111.content:
Jess was sitting down on her couch watching TV as Marissa came into the room. Marissa was past 200 pounds now, and she had no desire to slow down. Jess was her real desire, feeding and fattening her partner was her main priority. In fact, the idea to move to Italy was Marissa’s idea. She told Jess they should go on a vacation there, and Jess took that as “buy a mansion there and move there for an unknown amount of time.” Still, both women are excited to go and see the sights, as well as get out of the public eye. Marissa walked over to Jess fully clothed and began to talk with Jess.

“Hey babe, what do you think about going out for our last lunch in the country?” Jess did like the idea of eating out one more time before the move.

“You know what, that could be fun. How about where we met?” Jess said, eyeing up Marissa.

“Aww yeah that’s so cute!” Marissa shouted excited while Jess got up to get changed.

At the restaurant, they both walked inside and Jess saw how much the restaurants had changed since she first bought the chain. Now they were built for the morbildly obese, having high tech feature in the booths to make it easier for the patrons to eat comfortably. As Marissa walked up to the counter she began to order for herself.

“Hi there, I’ll take a number 3, um.. a number 4, three number 6 combos please, an extra large poutine with extra curds and all the fixins’, and throw in a milkshake too please!” Marissa rubbed her belly, excited for her large meal, that was until she heard a familiar voice.”

“That’s quite the order there, never would’ve thought you’d eat that much.” Marissa looked up and saw that behind the counter was none other than her old manager, Karen, who was still working there. Since their last visit, it seems that Karen has been under even more stress trying to manage such an out of control burger joint. Karen's favourite way to relieve that stress was from snacking, and snacking HARD. Karen would munch on Thiqq Burger all day, from morning until night when she left. Her once thin physique was now popping out of her largest uniform yet, surly waiting on the next size up. Her face was chubbier, her gut was bigger, her boobs were larger and tight on her shirt, exposing a great deal of cleavage. Karen was a 200 pound fat mess, and was currently holding a half eaten burger. Her double chin was accented as she smiled at her old employee, who had gained enough to match weights with Karen.

“Karen… what a pleasant surprise… haha how’s it going?” Marissa began to sweat nervously, she really hated confrontation.

“It’s going great Mar, really splendid. This job really makes me stressed, but I’ve uh, learned to cope. Looks like you have too, huh? Enjoying the food even without working here hahaha” Karen said, taking a bite from her burger while devilishly smiling at Marissa. Jess was feeling uncomfortable for Marissa, and also very hungry, so she finally decided to interject.

“Excuse me is there a problem? Cause I’d like my food, Ma’am.” Jess said, leaning her large bulk against the counter, holding her gold status card. Immediately Karen stopped smiling, realizing who Jess is. She quickly moves to the cash register.

“My apologies, uh ma’am, please, go sit down and I’ll have my staff give you the works. We can get everything for you while you sit comfortably.” Karen said nervously, gesturing towards a booth. The women went to the booth, where moments later food begins to arrive. Workers bring milkshakes of every flavour, an assortment of soda’s, a tray full of fries to share, and dozens of burgers, nuggets, strips and sliders went into both of the girls bellies. Quickly Jess had undone her pants, after cramming down 3 double chicken burgers. Marissa had stretchy pants on, but they were pinching hard, looking close to tearing on her fat legs.

“*Burrrpp*! Oh my yes! This is quite a send off feast!! *BRAhhhpp!* Don’t you think, babe!?” Jess said before guzzling a bowl of gravy into her mouth, spilling it on to her large jiggly breasts. Marissa could only moan and nodded her head, as she had her mouth full of a triple deluxe burger. As both women continued to eat themselves to the brink of exploding, Karen watched from the kitchen, stuffing her 8th burger into her mouth, terrified that she’d be reprimanded for her behavior. God I hope they don’t stay mad… shit I’m so screwed if I get fired… fuck, I need another burger… maybe some desert too. Karen went to the grill and continued to eat away her anxiety, hoping she’d get away with it.

After their meal, the ladies left, stuffed to their gills. They took their town car home and were greeted by the staff. Having their belongings packed, Gwen, Lisa, Olivia, Marissa and Jess left in the car to the airport. Once at the airport, they got clearance to the company hanger, where they saw the Harrow Inc. private jet. It was a prototype that they designed for the travel of obese people, hoping to roll it out on the new Harrow Inc. Airline company Allison was working on. On the plane had rooms for all the passengers. It was fully stocked with enough food to last all the women on board a week of eating.

“This is the life, Babe.” Jess said, cheersing her wine glass with Marissa, who nodded and clinked glasses together. “Here’s to the future, whatever it may hold.”
132112321122112221321211221111111.title: The Next Day

choices: 2 weeks pass, it's time to go
1321123211221122213212112211111111.content:
A couple weeks have passed since Jess and Marissa packed up and moved to Italy and Nicole was missing her friend. Not that Jen wasn’t great, but Nicole and Jess just got each other. Even if the last few months of their friendship were spent apart being gluttonous hogs with other people, they would always know what was going on in each others lives. Now Nicole only had her through the internet, which Jess didn’t frequent as much since she was enjoying her new home and the lovely new sights. All of this made for Nicole to try and spend as much time with Allison and Jen as Possible. Allison was pretty busy though, as she was getting more and more involved in the business, especially since Jess had left. Recently, Allison had been getting more and more hands on with the company, which made Nicole feel bad about, especially since she didn’t care about the business as much as her charities, which no one else really seemed interested in. All of this left Nicole feeling weird around Allison, since she was either eating or working.

All of this led to Nicole wanting to spend more time with Jen, which Jen was thrilled about. Recently Harrow Inc. bought a huge professional baseball team, which Nicole and Jen had been taking full advantage of their services and created a utopian Baseball stadium. Every concession was all of their food, and still served at a low price, causing long lines and large seats. The stadium was equipped with everything Allison thought was ideal for the new obese future they were creating. Currently, Nicole and Jen are at their own teams game, they’re sitting in their massive private box, which has a loaded kitchen, a bar, games and some rich friends and co owners. Jen and Nicole are seated right at the window, seated and bloated, rubbing their full bellies while ordering their third helpings. Jen and Nicole were very close in weight, as both were around 330 pounds. The ladies looked absolutely gorged and drunk, drinking right from the bottles of their expensive wine.

“*Braaahpp!* oh my *hic* I can’t believe how hot *hic* all of these baseball players *hic* are!” Nicole said after taking a large swig from her wine, sloshing her belly with her other hand. Nicole's appetite was only increasing more since she let loose and began to enjoy food again, resulting in her weight climbing higher and higher after every fattening and full meal. The third large tray that Nicole ordered had just shown up, being placed on her table in front of her. The tray was loaded with multiple burgers, an entire roast chicken, french fries with gravy and tons of cheese, as well as mozz sticks and onion rings. Nicole squealed as she reached for two burgers and bit into them at the same time, squeezing them into her mouth so she could eat as much as possible. Jen was in a similar position as Nicole, as she was bursting out of her outfit as she grabbed her third order of food, which was pasta, ribs, mashed potatoes, perogies and a huge steak. She picked up her steak but before digging in, she asked for a request from her servant first.

“I’ll tell you know I’ll want another plate of this exact order, so you might as well get it friggin’ ready now! Here we go!” Jen quickly pushed the steak into mouth, taking a large bite before taking another. Her large body jiggling at every movement. “Nic, *burp* I’m so happy we’re doing this *munch* mmmmm…. This food is too good…I’m gonna need more soon… *BURRRPP!* God yes that was great, I feel much better with that room open, mmm potatoes!” Jen began digging into her mashed potatoes, eating a pile that looked as though it weighed at least a pound.

As both girls continue to gorge themselves, a thin woman approached them. She very thin, showing very little curves on her frame. She has medium length black hair that was shiny and silky, but flat and bold. She had thick frame glasses and was carrying a tablet. She was smaller than the average person, but one look would tell you she’s not one to mess with. As she walked up to the ladies she was standing next to Jen before announcing her attendance.

“Hello, Jen. It’s good to see you, how are you doing?” The woman said with a smile, before going cold again and taking a seat. Jen swallowed her food and smiled at the woman before speaking.

“Julie! What a surprise, what are you doing here?” Jen said surprised, before turning to Nicole and quickly remembering that Nicole doesn’t know her. “Oh sorry Nic, this is my agent, Julie Broadheart! She’s fantastic, though it’s not often I get surprise visits from her.” Jen said curiously.

“Well Jen, normally I would just call but I was in town and I thought I’d bring the good news I’m about to share with you in person.” Julie said with a smile before continuing. “I was looking hard for new work, and you were real close to some stellar TV gigs, but they all fell flat. Luckily, I know a director who happens to be pre-pro on a big new hollywood flick, and he just told me he wants to cast you as the big lead! He said the movie would have to be a smash hit with someone of your fame and skill on it! Isn’t that amazing?” Julie said with excitement. “You’re gonna be a huge star! It’s happening girl!” Jen sat there, shocked about her news. She began to cheer while looking around the room.

“Yes! It’s happening! I’m gonna be a movie star! And soon enough I’ll have TV shows and video game contracts, I’ll be the biggest star in Hollywood! Oh my thank you so much! When does it start?”

“Well it’s pretty soon, he wants you there in 2 weeks I’m afraid. But if it’s any consolation he’s sending a co-star to come and hang out with you here for an evening and travel down to LA with. I’ll send you the rest of the details via email, but here’s your big shot Jen, I’m so proud.” Julie smiled and began to walk away, leaving Jen and Nicole both shocked.

“So wait, you’re leaving too??” Nicole said, sad by the news.

“Aw Nic, I know I’m sorry, I’ve been waiting for this for a year now though, it’s finally happening I have to go. Come with me! It’ll be so fun!” Jen said, trying to convince her friend.

“Well it’s a thought, but I’m not sure if I like that kind of place. I’m really happy for you, just bummed I’m gonna miss another one of my friends.” Nicole said, holding her friends’ hand.

“Well, we’re here now, let’s make it count! I plan to eat enough to get my fill of you over these two weeks, so let's friggin' eat girl!” Jen said, holding up a chicken leg and taking a bite from it, Nicole grabbing a burger and doing the same. “We’re gonna need the next tray, pronto!” Jen said, inhaling her food while Nicole does the same. They continued this for the rest of the evening, tray after tray of fattening greasy and savoury foods, bottle after bottle of wine.

13211232112211222132121122111111112.title: 2 weeks pass, it's almost time to go

choices: Nicole decides to spend time with Allison
132112321122112221321211221111111121.content:
Over the next two weeks Jen and Nicole spent almost all their time together, enjoying various yacht parties, sporting events, concerts and of course all of the food that came with them. Jen had her people looking after all of her living arrangements and contracts, she just wanted to have fun before she was off to L.A. Jen is getting set to leave tomorrow night making Nicole sad because she was losing another friend. Currently the ladies are on Jens private boat sitting by the pool, soaking in the sun while sipping on mixed drinks and platters of food. Jen was currently eating her third bucket of fried chicken, her double chins shaking as she slurps the greasy meal with force. She is currently in a bathing suit that isn’t hiding very much of her body, especially since it’s so close to bursting right off her fat body. At 350 pounds Jen was quickly realizing the scale of her own size. She was struggling to move more and more, incredibly even managing to eat more than she was before. All of this led to the obese Jen we see today, whose breasts were hanging over her colossal belly, which was resting heavily on her large legs.

Nicole had also been eating more than usual over the past two weeks, but nothing close to Jen. Nicole figured it was likely Jen was eating to keep her from thinking about leaving her friends, or that there’s a solid chance they’ll make her eat less in LA, meaning she wants to enjoy her final gorging days, at least until she’s out of hollywood. Nicole officially weighed less than Jen, tipping the scales at 342 pounds, slightly but still just a bit smaller than Jen. Nicole thought it was strange to officially be the thinnest member of the group, she never would’ve seen Jen or Jess growing into the blobs they are now. Nicole was still an incredibly fat woman though, and still ate more food than once thought possible. Currently, Nicole looked to be eating a large meat lovers pizza, with a platter of pasta and a cake next to that. She was eating a more relaxed pace than Jen, but also drinking more heavily. Currently she is drinking straight from a bottle of whisky. Her own double chin getting the beverage all over it. Her belly was also large, and her breasts heavy and weighing down on her own gut which had the pizza resting on it. As both women are indulging in the sun, Jens phone buzzes, causing her to check her text.

“Mmm Nicole, guess what!” Jen said while looking at her phone. “That house I was looking at, the real big one in LA? Well it’s confirmed, I just bought it!” Jen quickly grabbed more chicken to celebrate and lifted them into the air slightly, before chowing down.

“That’s great Jen! I’m so happy for you! What exactly is this place like again?” Nicole asked before taking another swig from her bottle and grabbing her joint to spark it.

“Well, it’s a gorgeous modern home in the hollywood hills, it has a 30 car garage, an indoor and outdoor pool, a massive 20 person hot tub, as well as a spa, two kitchens, 7 bedrooms, 5 very large bathrooms, and so many other different rooms for activities. I love the home, and I’ll have the company fix things for my weight once I’m there.” Jen said before picking up a double stuffed hotdog and forced it into her mouth. “Oh my goodness this stuff never gets old.” Jen said practically moaning from the pleasure of her food.

“Wow Jen that’s amazing, seems like it will be very fun to be there. I’ll have to visit you once you know your schedule!” Nicole added, finishing her pizza. “Mmm that one was exceptional great… *burp!*” As Nicole picked up her pasta and started to chow down, Jen finished her bucket of chicken and picked up a platter of 6 more hot dogs, which she started inhaling into her fat face.

“I also… mmmm *munch munch* found out I’m meeting my *munch munch* co star for *belch* lunch tomorrow, which I’m just hoping *chew* she’s not a bitch or anything.”

“I’m sure she’ll be fine Jen, she’ll love you!” The day continued like this, as Nicole and Jen spent some of their final meals together, since Jen was going to be with her co star all day. Jen would say goodbye to Nicole before she left though. As Jen went to bed full and gorged, she was excited and nervous for whatever was coming with her future in hollywood.

Jen woke up around 10, eating a full and hearty breakfast while she got her fat figure ready for her meeting. She made it to the restaurant for around 12:30, roughly the same time as her co star was supposed to arrive. Jen was waiting to order food until her guest arrived, which made her stomach growl. Jen was so used to always having food going into her belly that when she wasn't eating something it just didn’t feel right. Just as Jen could swear her stomach growls were getting more powerful her guest walked into the private dining room. Jen couldn’t believe her eyes when she saw none other than Emma Stone standing in front of her, smiling as she walked closer.

“Hi there! You must be Jen?” Emma said, extending her arm to Jen who happily shook her hand back.

“Oh my goodness yes you’re Emma Stone! I had no idea you were my co star!” Jen said, still in shock about the gorgeous woman in the same room as her. “It’s so nice to meet you!”

“Hahaha well thank you, it’s nice to meet you too, Jen!” Emma said with a smile. “So I’ve heard this is your restaurant, is that true?” Emma said curiously.

“It is, well, it’s a little bit more complicated than that, I’ll explain after we order? How does that sound?” Jen said, excited to order some food.

“Oh that sounds great! I’m cheating on my diet while I’m here so let’s order up! What do you recommend?” Emma asked Jen, who quickly started to answer.

“Well as you can probably tell by my figure, I have enjoyed a meal here once or twice.” Jen said shaking her belly, laughing a little. “I say we just order one of everything, you can try anything you want that way!” Jen said to Emma.

“Okay that sounds fun! God I haven’t eaten like this in months, a real good pig out!” Emma shouted happily as the waitstaff came to the table.

As Both women ordered one of everything, Jen began to catch Emma up on her life and her new found love for food. Jen found Emma was incredibly receptive and happy to chat, saying how she’d never had thiqq burger as celebs were on strict hollywood diets. As the food began to come out to the table Emmas’ look on her face was amazing, she sniffed the air for all of the great smells in front of her.

“Oh my goodness…. Mmm it smells so good….” Emma said, looking excited to dig in. There was pastas, burgers, pizza, sausage, bacon, hotdogs and full roast chickens. Emma couldn’t believe the amount of food that was in front of her. Emma quickly grabbed a burger and bit into it, leaning back in ecstasy. “Oh my goodness! This might be the greatest thing I’ve ever eaten!” Emma took another bite, and then another. She quickly began to take bites from everything, trying as much of the junk food as she could. Jen was also eating of course, trying to look under control, but she had just eaten 3 hot dogs in less than a minute so she wasn’t very successful in her efforts.

After about an hour of on again off again eating, Emma finally threw in the towel. Her small bloated belly had unbuttoned her pants and left her shirt riding up. She was drunk on food and also the whole bottle of wine she drank while cheating on her diet. Jen had managed to eat everything Emma didn’t, holding back from ordering some more dessert (didn’t want to look like too much of a pig after all).

“Woww… Jen that was *hic* just amazing!!!... *hic* Holy shit I’m so… fullll… fuck I need to sleep this off *hic* just… for a few minutes…. *hic*” Emma said drunkenly, leaning back in her chair again.

“Let’s go back to mine! We can take some naps.” Jen said, getting the staff to assist them with leaving for home. Emma slept for a couple hours, waking up confused and full. 141.content:
"Lemme get, uhhhhh, extra banana peppers on that..."

"We don't have banana peppers. Just jalapenos."

Bianca Hayden, or Bee to her friends, was ringing this idiot out for his sandwich. It seemed like that was all she did nowadays post-grad, tell clueless idiots that they couldn't get their subs toasted because the toaster was busted.

"That'll be $7.29."

"Oh, lemme add a cookie to that."

She thought about just telling him no, but the manager wouldn't like that. It was only a minor inconvenience, but Bee's life felt like an endless series of them. "$8.78."

The dude handed her a 10 dollar bill. She flashed a fake smile as she handed him his change. "That'll be up for you at the end of the counter."

***

Bee washed her hands after using the restroom like a good little employee, looking at herself in the mirror as she scrubbed.

Bianca was a hard girl to miss in a crowd for a number of reasons. The most obvious reason was her height; at 6'4", she towered over most women her age and up to this point was taller than every single one of her romantic partners. She used to be a bit self-conscious about it during middle and high school but as college rolled around, she learned to own it, almost never going to a party without a pair of high-heeled boots.

Another attention-grabber was her goth-inspired personal aesthetic. Bee wasn't one to straight-up identify as a goth, she didn't like the music or the culture or the over-the-top look of the more "serious" goths that she'd see on Instagram, but it was hard for her to deny the fashion similarities. She had short, dyed black hair, naturally pale skin, a little nose ring in her left nostril, a stud in her bellybutton, a penchant for applying heavy black makeup around her eyes and on her lips, and a number of edgy tattoos on her arms and legs. Nevertheless, she preferred "punk" as her descriptor. Instead of the frilly, leathery goth dress code, she often wore Japanese hardcore or black metal tees and skinny jeans. Right now though, she was in her work uniform: a black t-shirt with "RANDALL'S SUBPORIUM" on the back and a pair of blue jeans.

The last major standout feature of Bee's was her figure. Bee was the epitome of what the kids called "thicc" nowadays and frequently got a lot of often unwanted attention because of her big booty and wide hips. If she had a nickel for every time some douche came up unsolicited and tried to touch her ass at college parties or at the bar, she'd be a millionaire. Nestled between another paper towel and a tampon wrapper was a folded up lottery ticket. Huh, odd. Why would someone just throw this away in the bathroom? Whatever. She slipped it in her back pocket. Could be lucky, right?

***

Bee took a bite from her turkey and bacon sandwich. Of course, it was absolutely delicious. That's part of the reason why Bee kept working at this dump: she got half-off sandwiches and Randall's had the best sandwiches in town. You could say Bee was a "foodie". You could also say that Bee had a... thing for large amounts of food. The feeling and pressure of fullness, the incredible, overwhelming taste, the vibration in her throat when she released a deep belch, the hedonism of at all... Let's just say that Bee tried to keep her portions down when she was on break at work; she didn't want to have any embarrassing mishaps. This lead to an odd dichotomy in her mind. She had a genuine interest in sampling food from around the world, tasting the complex flavors of the finest quality ingredients, but if she ate too much, well, she'd really, really wanna fuck.

As she ate her food and scrolled idly down her Instagram feed, the general manager, Rosario, came over to the table. Rosario was a slightly short Latina woman in her 40s. Her demeanor was often cheerful but she ran a tight ship. "Hey, Bianca? Can I ask a favor?"

"Mmm?" She looked her in the eyes, mouth full of sandwich.

"I hate to tell you this, but Brian just called off. Says his car's busted and can't get a ride over."

She swallowed and rolled her eyes. "Goddamnit Brian."

"Yeaaaaah... Can you stay until close tonight? If you can't it's okay, I can find somebody else."

She sighed. "Yeah, it's fine. I can stay, I don't have anything going on." In fact, Bee had planned on buying and subsequently stuffing a whole McDonald's dinner box into her face tonight, but she supposed that could wait.

Rosario breathed a sigh of relief. "Oh God, thank you. You're a lifesaver." She looked at the clock: time to pick up her kids from school. "I'll leave you alone now. Call me if you need anything, it's not like anybody comes in here after 3 though. See ya tomorrow!"

After Rosario left, Bee continued to munch on her sandwich. Yummy.

***

A couple hours of daydreaming and occasional sandwich making later, a suspicious, out of breath customer burst through the glass door. Outright ignoring Bee's flatly delivered greeting of "Hi there, what can I get ya?", the crazy-haired lady pretty much jogged her way to the women's bathroom. Eh, whatever. Randall's got its fair share of people who came in exclusively for the public restroom, and she couldn't give less of a shit.

Soon, the lady re-emerged as frazzled as ever, jogging to the counter where Bee continued to stand. She leaned over the counter, breathing heavily. "You didn't happen to find a lottery ticket lying around, did you?"

Oh shit. If there was a question to answer with a lie, this was it. "I didn't, no. Why?"

"Shit. The winning lottery ticket was sold today at the gas station down the street and they can't find who bought it." She stopped to catch her breath for a moment. "I bought a ticket earlier but I lost it. Are you sure you didn't see anything?"

Bee's heart was pounding, but she had to conceal her nervousness. "Sorry, I didn't."

"Okay." The lady removed a pad of paper from her purse and ripped a sheet off, scribbling her phone number down. "Call me if you find it. Please." She smacked the paper down on the counter and stormed off.

The lottery ticket was suddenly burning a hole in Bee's back pocket. Could this be...? She rushed into the office behind the kitchen where that lady wouldn't be able to see her, even though she already left. Precautions must be taken. She pulled out her phone and the ticket and looked up the winning numbers. The ticket was for the MegaBall, which according to the Google search had hit its largest jackpot of all time. And...

Oh my God. They matched.

The numbers matched.

Bee held in her hand a winning lottery ticket which after taxes would net her around 750 million dollars.

750 MILLION DOLLARS.

She didn't know how to handle this information, but she KNEW she wasn't gonna call that woman. This was hers. She HAD to claim it.

Ice cream. Lots and lots of ice cream.

"No, I want all of it. That's why I'm talking to you instead of going to the frozen aisle and getting it myself." Bee stared bullets into Stacey. She loved being intimidating.

"Uhhh..."

Just what she needed. She was always happy that she lived in a city where she could actually afford to live by herself, that way she wouldn't have to annoy her roommates with her weird kinky sex stuff or casual hookups.
